hydro_energy.title: Hydro Energy
hydro_energy.image_alt: This is an image about Hydro Energy
hydro_energy.description: Hydro energy, or hydroelectric power, is a renewable energy source that uses the movement of water to generate electricity. It is one of the most widely used renewable energy sources worldwide.

steps.water_flow: Water Flow - A dam or river channels water towards turbines.
steps.turbine_rotation: Turbine Rotation - The force of moving water spins the turbines.
steps.electricity_generation: Electricity Generation - The turbines power a generator, converting kinetic energy into electrical energy.

list.ecosystem_impact: ❌ Can impact ecosystems and fish migration

wind_energy.title: Wind Energy
wind_energy.image_alt: This is an image about Wind Energy
wind_energy.description: Wind energy is a renewable energy source that converts the kinetic energy of the wind into electricity using wind turbines.

steps.wind_blows: Wind Blows - The wind turns the blades of a wind turbine.
steps.rotor_rotation: Rotation of the Rotor - The blades are connected to a rotor, which spins a generator.
steps.electricity_generation: Electricity Generation - The generator converts mechanical energy into electrical energy.

list.versatile: ✅ Can be installed on land or offshore

list.variable_wind: ❌ Wind speed is variable and unpredictable
list.wildlife_impact: ❌ Can impact bird and bat populations
list.space_requirement: ❌ Requires large open spaces for optimal efficiency
